<title level="1" right="Action">[Compose Missive](/Actions.aspx?ID=1591) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You spend 10 minutes drawing, writing, or inscribing, covering the [missive's](/equipment/consumables/missive) surface with text, images, or embossing.
name: Compose Missive
